description: Provides a list of a trials component's properties.

parameters.name: TrialComponentName
parameters.description: The name of the trial component to describe.

nested_items.name: TrialComponentName
nested_items.description: The name of the trial component.

nested_items.name: TrialComponentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trial component.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The name of the component as displayed. If DisplayName isn't specified, TrialComponentName is displayed.

nested_items.name: SourceArn
nested_items.description: The source Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The source job type.
InProgress.
Completed.
Failed.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: When the component started.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: When the component ended.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: When the component was created.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Who created the trial component.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
nested_items.description: The person or application which assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: When the component was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: Who last modified the component.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
nested_items.description: The person or application which assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The hyperparameters of the component.

nested_items.name: StringValue
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: StringValue
nested_items.description: The string value of a categorical hyperparameter. If you specify a value for this parameter, you can't specify the NumberValue parameter.

nested_items.name: NumberValue
nested_items.description: The numeric value of a numeric hyperparameter. If you specify a value for this parameter, you can't specify the StringValue parameter.

nested_items.name: InputArtifacts
nested_items.description: The input artifacts of the component.

nested_items.name: MediaType
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: MediaType
nested_items.description: The media type of the artifact, which indicates the type of data in the artifact file. The media type consists of a type and a subtype concatenated with a slash (/) character, for example, text/csv, image/jpeg, and s3/uri. The type specifies the category of the media. The subtype specifies the kind of data.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The location of the artifact.

nested_items.name: OutputArtifacts
nested_items.description: The output artifacts of the component.

nested_items.name: MediaType
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: MediaType
nested_items.description: The media type of the artifact, which indicates the type of data in the artifact file. The media type consists of a type and a subtype concatenated with a slash (/) character, for example, text/csv, image/jpeg, and s3/uri. The type specifies the category of the media. The subtype specifies the kind of data.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The location of the artifact.

nested_items.name: MetadataProperties
nested_items.description: Metadata properties of the tracking entity, trial, or trial component.

nested_items.name: CommitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID.

nested_items.name: Repository
nested_items.description: The repository.

nested_items.name: GeneratedBy
nested_items.description: The entity this entity was generated by.

nested_items.name: ProjectId
nested_items.description: The project ID.

nested_items.name: Metrics
nested_items.description: The metrics for the component.

nested_items.name: MetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the metric.

nested_items.name: SourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the source.

nested_items.name: TimeStamp
nested_items.description: When the metric was last updated.

nested_items.name: Max
nested_items.description: The maximum value of the metric.

nested_items.name: Min
nested_items.description: The minimum value of the metric.

nested_items.name: Last
nested_items.description: The most recent value of the metric.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: The number of samples used to generate the metric.

nested_items.name: Avg
nested_items.description: The average value of the metric.

nested_items.name: StdDev
nested_items.description: The standard deviation of the metric.

nested_items.name: LineageGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the lineage group.

nested_items.name: Sources
nested_items.description: A list of ARNs and, if applicable, job types for multiple sources of an experiment run.

nested_items.name: SourceArn
nested_items.description: The source Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The source job type.
